name: Team Fortress 2 Classified
author: support@pterodactyl.io
description: Team Fortress 2 Classified is a community server project that runs as a Source dedicated server and requires the live Team Fortress 2 dedicated server files. This egg installs both dependencies via SteamCMD and starts Classified with a -tf_path pointing at the TF2 install.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

set -e

##
# Variables
# STEAM_USER, STEAM_PASS, STEAM_AUTH - Steam user setup.
# WINDOWS_INSTALL - if it's a windows server you want to install set to 1
# TF2_APPID - Live TF2 dedicated server appid
# SRCDS_APPID - Classified dedicated server appid
##

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

# Install both TF2 and Classified into the same server directory to avoid keeping
# two full installs that duplicate shared game files.
INSTALL_DIR=/mnt/server

## install live TF2 dedicated server (required dependency)
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir ${INSTALL_DIR} +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update ${TF2_APPID} validate +quit

## install Classified dedicated server (overlay)
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir ${INSTALL_DIR} +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} validate +quit

## set up steamclient libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so


echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
